title: My drafts and
content:
duplicate of /questions/1555754 thread

My 'sent mail' has suddenly all disappeared - although still on the mail file server. Inbox mail is fine - but if I send a test message to myself, I get the reply, but the sent message is not saveb. I have uninstalled and reinstalled Thunderbird twice, n - the second time deleting the Mozilla folder under C:\users and then rebooting This happened whilst I was using Thunderbird. I have used Thunderbird for years without problems I have run a virus scan with Malwarebytes, but no problmes showed up. All folders are still vixible on my iPhone

I am about to try reinstalling again. I don't want to have to change email clients.

Any help much appreciated.. Thank you Joan Kemp
creator: joan.kemp1

title: Downloading from a .ics file
content:
I don't know if something has changed since the last time I downloaded a .ics file into thunderbird or not.

I used to be able to load a .ics file directly into 'events' in my calendar. But something has changed. When I download the file now it gives it the name "Zul52mNeovl5. Which happens to be the name of the file I'm downloading from. So now I have 3 options of where to put the file - Events, Tasks or this filename. I can't find this file anywhere on my computer. How do I get rid of it?

Any Help would be appreciated.

Thanks
creator: aholtby

title: I am going in circles and have no idea what I have done. I gave $20 but I don't see that it was taken. I am here because my old account is screwed up and I can't access it, and neither can you.
content: I have no idea what I have accomplished and what I have to do next. I am here because I cannot access my current email account,and neither can you. I paid $20 but I still see a pay page. Get Thunderbird installed and working. I had Thunderbird years ago and lost it, I think someone wanted me on the foxinternet.com program. Assume I am a new person to access the internet.

title: Thunderbird is not alphabetizing correctly
content:
How can I fix Thunderbird's sudden problem with alphabetizing in the list of folders/subfolders? E.g. "To read tablet" is sorted after "To read WebMd" and "Karin" comes after "ZZ-Friends Common" and "Susie" comes after "Zhahai"

This started happening relatively recently - a few months ago, I think. Suddenly folders that used to be in the correct alphabetic order were suddenly misplaced.
creator: cascade5
